Title: Requires each institution within the state university of New York and the city university of New York to have at least one vending machine making emergency contraception available for purchase
Summary: Requires each institution within the state university of New York and the city university of New York offering in-person student instruction to have at least one vending machine making emergency contraception available for purchase.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring institutions within the state university of New York and the city university of New York to have at least one vending machine on campus which makes emergency contraception available for purchase
